name: wndash
title: Wikinews Dashboard
description: Shows the state of English Wikinews at a glance
author: Douglas Gardner

name: recentcats
title: Recent Categories
description: A list of recently created categories on an arbitrary Wikimedia wiki
author: Douglas Gardner

name: crossredirs
title: Cross namespace redirects
description: A list of mainspace to userspace redirects on arbitrary Wikimedia wikis
author: Douglas Gardner

name: myotrs
title: myotrs
description: A tool to view the recent OTRS tags of a user
author: Douglas Gardner
